summary: An ordinance submitting to the qualified electors, (voters) of the City of Seattle, at the general municipal election to be held in said City on Tuesday, March 8, 1932, the proposition of creating an indebtedness in the sum of $1,800,000 and the issuance and sale therefor of general negotiable interest bearing serial coupon bonds of said City in said amount, for the purpose of paying the cost of construction of permanent approaches to 15th Avenue Northwest Bridge; and requiring the City Comptroller etc.
